misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, a formidable presence on the golf course, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Helsingin Golfklubi with unwavering determination. His imposing stature and rumored wrestling skills ensure that few dare to challenge him, adding an intriguing dimension to his persona.

Beyond the greens, Olli balances his athletic pursuits with a successful career as a professional model, showcasing a versatility that extends beyond the realm of sports. This blend of physical prowess and aesthetic appeal makes him a captivating figure both on and off the course.

With seven past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Olli's experience is undeniable. Though the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his participation in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 marks his eighth appearance, presenting a fresh opportunity to demonstrate his skills and compete for the top spot.
